data.title: Felipe González
data.text:
Work Department

TMT, Startups, innovation and entrepreneurship, cybersecurity, data protection and privacy

Position

Partner

Career

Specialist Lawyer in TMT.

Felipe has more than 5 years of experience in the legal advice of national and international companies in TMT, Startups, innovation, entrepreneurship, cybersecurity, privacy, data protection, corporate law and dispute resolution.

He is a lawyer from the University of the Hemispheres of Ecuador, where he received an honorable mention in his degree thesis entitled “mining royalties in mining contracts in Ecuadorian law”.

He is the organizing founder of the chapter of Legal Hackers in the city of Quito and founder of the digital platform unalaw.com

Languages

Spanish and English.

Education

He completed an exchange program (LLM), focused on non-renewable resource law and TMT at the National University of Singapore in Singapore; He completed a Legal Project Management program at IE Law School (Madrid) and is certified as a Legal Project Practitioner (LPP) by the International Institute of Legal Project Management.
